section.title: To Enable OVSVAPP Service for Centralized Logging
section.para: To enable OVSVAPP Service for centralized logging:

listitem.para: Log in to the lifecycle manager.
Edit the file below:
Set the value of centralized_logging to true as shown in the following sample:
listitem.screen: logr_services: neutron-ovsvapp: logging_options: - centralized_logging: enabled: true format: json ...

listitem.para: Commit your configuration to the Git repository (), as follows:
listitem.screen: cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "My config or other commit message"
